description.narrative: The project will rehabilitate infrastructure (national, provincial, and rural roads and irrigation facilities) damaged by the 2011 flood to be implemented from April 2012 to March 2015.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative:
Current Project Restoration of critical public and social infrastructure assets to their original standards or better
Overall project Reconstruction of critical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access and protect against future flooding

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Current Project: 90% of damaged infrastructure in subprojects in project provinces are reconstructed and rehabilitated by 2015

description.narrative:
Current Project Restoration of critical public and social infrastructure assets to their original standards or better
Overall project Reconstruction of critical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access and protect against future flooding

title.narrative: Current Project: Agricultural productivity in project area returns to pre-flood levels or better by 2015

description.narrative:
Current Project Restoration of critical public and social infrastructure assets to their original standards or better
Overall project Reconstruction of critical infrastructure to restore livelihoods and access and protect against future flooding

title.narrative: Current Project: Average travel times on project roads return to pre-flood levels or better by 2015
